EmailTemplate.subject: Update The Way You Work
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-open-office-benefits.aspx?cmp=EBBSJULYBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> The office is changing. Businesses are moving towards open offices which encourages more of a collaborative mindset!
Is an open office space right for your business?
